description: Tsukuba Saizou is an upperclassman at Ken`ichi`s school and a black belt in the karate club. His style of martial arts is sport karate, which focuses on the basics of karate and mixes in other techniques, such as boxing. He is the referee for Ken`ichi`s fight against Daimonji and, following Ken`ichi`s win, wants to test Ken`ichi`s skills. He easily defeats Ken`ichi, but he is not satisfied with his victory because he finds bruises on his body after the fight. When he fights Kenichi a second time, Kenichi wins easily.
name: Tsukuba Saizou
